channel.title: Posts on Call of the Netherdeep
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Call of the Netherdeep

item.title: Welcome to the Call of the Netherdeep Site
item.description: All information about the Call of the Netherdeep adventure will be posted on this website. Session logs will be captured at the beginning of each session. This is a work-in-progress site so expect things to move around for awhile until a good workflow is established.
